title: Tales of Virtuous Stepmothers
description: You already know how the "wicked stepmother" has become enshrined in legend and folklore. But in this modern era, most of us who are stepmothers or have one ourselves have seen a different truth. Many stepmothers are loving, courageous and innovative.In this collection of original tales, you will find many kinds of stepmothersâ€”queens, scholars, warriors, travelers and entrepreneurs. Turn the pages and see how these heroic parents and their children achieve greatness and overcome adversity together!
author: Georgina Warren
